info.name: MDental SaaS API
info.description: A complete API collection for all MDental SaaS microservices

request.description: Returns information about the authenticated user based on JWT
Get an access token from Keycloak to use with other API requests
Creates a new Keycloak realm for a clinic (requires SUPER_ADMIN role)
Regenerates the admin password for a realm (requires SUPER_ADMIN role)
Returns a paginated list of clinics
Returns the full clinic profile including related entities

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Test Clinic",
    "slug": "test-clinic",
    "realm": "mdental-test-clinic",
    "legalName": "Test Clinic LLC",
    "taxId": "123456789",
    "description": "A test dental clinic",
    "logoUrl": "https://example.com/logo.png",
    "primaryColor": "#336699",
    "secondaryColor": "#99CCFF",
    "licenseNumber": "DEN-12345",
    "licenseExpiry": "2025-12-31",
    "privacyPolicyUrl": "https://example.com/privacy",
    "defaultTimeZone": "Africa/Casablanca",
    "defaultCurrency": "MAD",
    "locale": "fr-MA"
}

request.description: Creates a new clinic with the provided details

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Updated Test Clinic",
    "slug": "test-clinic",
    "legalName": "Test Clinic LLC Updated",
    "taxId": "987654321",
    "description": "An updated test dental clinic",
    "logoUrl": "https://example.com/new-logo.png",
    "primaryColor": "#003366",
    "secondaryColor": "#6699CC",
    "licenseNumber": "DEN-54321",
    "licenseExpiry": "2026-12-31",
    "privacyPolicyUrl": "https://example.com/privacy-updated",
    "defaultTimeZone": "Africa/Casablanca",
    "defaultCurrency": "MAD",
    "locale": "fr-MA",
    "status": "ACTIVE"
}

request.description: Updates an existing clinic with the provided details
Updates the status of an existing clinic (ACTIVE, INACTIVE, SUSPENDED)
Deletes an existing clinic and all related data
Returns all addresses for the specified clinic
Returns the address with the specified ID
Creates a new address for the clinic
Updates an existing address
Deletes an address
Returns all contact information for the specified clinic
Returns the contact information with the specified ID
Creates new contact information for the clinic
Updates existing contact information
Deletes contact information
Returns all business hours for the specified clinic
Returns the business hours with the specified ID
Creates new business hours for the clinic
Updates existing business hours
Deletes business hours
Returns all holidays for the specified clinic
Returns holidays for the specified clinic within a date range
Returns the holiday with the specified ID
Creates a new holiday for the clinic
Updates an existing holiday
Deletes a holiday
Returns a paginated list of patients for the clinic
Returns summary information about patients for the clinic
Searches for patients by name
Returns patients with the specified status (ACTIVE, INACTIVE, DECEASED)
Returns detailed information about a specific patient
Creates a new patient record
Updates an existing patient record
Soft deletes a patient record
Permanently deletes a patient record (for GDPR compliance)
Returns all addresses for the specified patient
Returns the address with the specified ID
Creates a new address for the patient
Updates an existing patient address
Deletes a patient address
Returns all contact information for the specified patient

item.name: Get Patient Contact Info By ID

request.description: Returns the contact information with the specified ID
Creates new contact information for the patient
Updates existing patient contact information
Deletes patient contact information
Returns all identifiers for the specified patient
Returns the identifier with the specified ID
Creates a new identifier for the patient
Updates an existing patient identifier
Deletes a patient identifier
Returns all emergency contacts for the specified patient
Returns the emergency contact with the specified ID
Creates a new emergency contact for the patient
Updates an existing emergency contact
Deletes an emergency contact
Returns all consents for the specified patient
Returns the consent with the specified ID
Creates or updates a consent for the patient
Deletes a consent
Verifies if the patient has granted a specific consent (TREATMENT, DATA_SHARING, SMS, EMAIL_NOTIFICATION, MARKETING, RESEARCH, OTHER)
Registers a new portal account for the patient
Updates the last login timestamp for the patient portal account
Gets preferences for the patient portal account
Updates preferences for the patient portal account
Deletes the patient portal account
